languages.text: "Честно — не знаю. Адептус Арбитес больше не существует в Коронусе, но это не значит, что я не могу служить закону Бога-Императора. О своем будущем пути подумаю потом, если, как вы уже сказали, мы выживем".
"Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."
languages.original_text: "Честно — не знаю. Адептус Арбитес больше не существует в Коронусе, но это не значит, что я не могу служить закону Бога-Императора. О своем будущем пути подумаю потом, если, как вы уже сказали, мы выживем".

traits.locale_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."
"Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."
"Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."
"Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."
"Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

languages.text: 「正直に、ですか？わかりません。高等裁定局はもうこのエクスパンスには存在しません。ですが、それが神帝陛下の法に仕えることができない理由にはなりません。未来のことは、あとで考えます。あなたの言う通り、もし生き延びることができれば」
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に、ですか？わかりません。高等裁定局はもうこのエクスパンスには存在しません。ですが、それが神帝陛下の法に仕えることができない理由にはなりません。未来のことは、あとで考えます。あなたの言う通り、もし生き延びることができれば」

languages.text: "Ganz ehrlich? Ich weiß es nicht. Das Adeptus Arbites existiert nicht länger in der Ausdehnung, aber das bedeutet nicht, dass ich dem Gesetz des Gottimperators nicht weiter dienen kann. Ich werde später über meine Zukunft nachdenken, falls wir, wie Ihr sagt, überleben."
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ehrlich? Ich weiß es nicht. Das Adeptus Arbites existiert nicht länger in der Ausdehnung, aber das bedeutet nicht, dass ich dem Gesetz des Gottimperators nicht weiter dienen kann. Ich werde später über meine Zukunft nachdenken, falls wir, wie Ihr sagt, überleben."

languages.text: « Honnêtement ? Je ne sais pas. L'Adeptus Arbites n'existe plus dans les Étendues, mais cela ne m'empêchera pas de servir la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Je me soucierai de mon futur plus tard, si nous survivons. »
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: « Honnêtement ? Je ne sais pas. L'Adeptus Arbites n'existe plus dans les Étendues, mais cela ne m'empêchera pas de servir la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Je me soucierai de mon futur plus tard, si nous survivons. »

« Honnêtement ? Je ne sais pas. L'Adeptus Arbites n'existe plus dans les Étendues, mais cela ne m'empêchera pas de servir la loi de l'Empereur-Dieu. Je me soucierai de mon futur plus tard, si nous survivons. »

languages.text: «¿Sinceramente? No lo sé. El Adeptus Arbites ya no existe en la Extensión, pero eso no me impediría dispensar la ley del Dios Emperador. Ya me plantearé mi futuro luego si, como usted dice, sobrevivo».
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sinceramente? No lo sé. El Adeptus Arbites ya no existe en la Extensión, pero eso no me impediría dispensar la ley del Dios Emperador. Ya me plantearé mi futuro luego si, como usted dice, sobrevivo».

languages.text: “实话实说吗？我也不清楚。科罗努斯扩区已经没有什么法务部了，但即便如此，我也依然可以遵循神皇的律法。我打算好好考虑一下接下来该怎么办，当然，前提是我们能像你说得那样活下来。”
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: “实话实说吗？我也不清楚。科罗努斯扩区已经没有什么法务部了，但即便如此，我也依然可以遵循神皇的律法。我打算好好考虑一下接下来该怎么办，当然，前提是我们能像你说得那样活下来。”

languages.text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse... Bilmiyorum. Adeptus Arbites artık Enginlik'te yok ancak bu, Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'na hizmet edemeyeceğim anlamına gelmez. Dediğin gibi hayatta kalırsak geleceğimi daha sonra düşüneceğim."
languages.original_text: "Honestly? I don't know. The Adeptus Arbites no longer exists in the Expanse, but that doesn't mean I can't serve the God-Emperor's Law. I will consider my future later, if, as you say, we survive."

traits.locale_text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse... Bilmiyorum. Adeptus Arbites artık Enginlik'te yok ancak bu, Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'na hizmet edemeyeceğim anlamına gelmez. Dediğin gibi hayatta kalırsak geleceğimi daha sonra düşüneceğim."

"Dürüst olmak gerekirse... Bilmiyorum. Adeptus Arbites artık Enginlik'te yok ancak bu Tanrı İmparator'un kanunlarına hizmet edemeyeceğim anlamına gelmez. Geleceğimi daha sonra düşüneceğim, eğer dediğin gibi hayatta kalırsak."
